00017         public class ModelFacade : IModelFacade

00026         public ModelFacade(IEntityDatabase database, IEntityFactory factory, IParserFacade parser, IBluetooth bluetooth)
00027         {
00028             this.database = database;
00029             this.factory = factory;
00030             this.parser = parser;
00031             this.bluetooth = bluetooth;
00032             this.fileHelper = DependencyService.Get<IFileHelper>();
00033             //Create new Profile, if none exists yet
00034             if (database.GetAllProfiles().Count == 0)
00035             {
00036                 CreateEmptyProfile();
00037             }
00038         }
00039

00044 
00048                 private IEntityFactory factory;
00049

00054

00066         public IProfile CreateEmptyProfile()
00067         {
00068             IProfile profile = factory.CreateEmptyProfile();
00069             database.Insert(profile);
00070             Activate(profile);
00071             return profile;
00072         }
00073 
00075         public IList<IDoctorsLetter> GetAllDoctorsLetters() => database.GetAllDoctorsLetters();
00076 
00078         public IList<IMedication> GetAllMedications() => database.GetAllMedications();
00079 
00081         public IMedication CreateEmptyMedication()
00082         {
00083             IMedication med = factory.CreateEmptyMedication();
00084             database.Insert(med);
00085             return med;
00086         }

00089         public IList<IDoctorsLetterGroup> GetAllGroups() => database.GetAllDoctorsLetterGroups();
00090 
00092         public IDoctorsLetterGroup CreateEmptyGroup()
00093         {
00094             IDoctorsLetterGroup group = factory.CreateEmptyGroup();
00095             database.Insert(group);
00096             return group;
00097         }
00098 
00100         public void SendLetter(IDoctorsLetter letter) => bluetooth.send(parser.ParseLetterToOriginalFile(letter));
00101 
00103         public void Update(IEntity entity) => database.Update(entity);
00104 
00106         public void Delete(IEntity entity) => database.Delete(entity);
